algorithms.search

Class Dfs<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.search.CommonSearcher<T>
      • algorithms.search.Dfs<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - this is the generic parameter received from the specific problem and represent the State.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Searcher<T>

    public class Dfs<T>
extends CommonSearcher<T>

    DFS- Depth first search

    The DFS algorithm solve the problem by searching the solution to the depth of each of the nodes in the specified problem

    extends CommonSearcher

    overrides the search method
